mapper.sql: "ID" as "id" ,"DOCUMENT_NO" as "documentNo" ,"ITEM_NO" as "itemNo" ,"FROM_DEPT" as "fromDept" ,"SEND_DATE" as "sendDate" ,"ITEM_CODE" as "itemCode" ,"ITEM_NAME" as "itemName" ,"ITEM_SPEC" as "itemSpec" ,"SEND_AMOUNT" as "sendAmount" ,"GET_AMOUNT" as "getAmount" ,"GET_DATE" as "getDate" ,"GET_FLAG" as "getFlag" ,"UNITS" as "units" ,"OPERATOR" as "operator" ,"SENDER" as "sender" ,"MEMOS" as "memos" ,"ANTI_FEE" as "antiFee" ,"ANTI_FEE_SUM" as "antiFeeSum" ,"NOBACK_FEE" as "nobackFee" ,"REQ_DATE" as "reqDate" ,"REQ_OPERATOR" as "reqOperator" ,"ORG_ID" as "orgId"
